Html:
When I try to use the .chm help file to view the documentation, I get the table of contents and can search, etc, but nothing ever show in the left pane.

Is there documentation available that works?

Search for Enabling CHM in windows. By default they are now blocked on windows vista+. It works fine for me on Win7 64bit once I unblocked it. Right click on it, select properties and then hit the "Unblock" button near the bottom.
